charges.charge_description: POSSESSION OF A FIREARM AND AMMUNITION BY A CONVICTED FELON(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of 120 months, as to each Count, with terms to run concurrent; Supervised Release for 3 years, with terms to run concurrent; SMA $500.00 due immediately; Fine waived

charges.charge_description: POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of 120 months, as to each Count, with terms to run concurrent; Supervised Release for 8 years, with terms to run concurrent; SMA $500.00 due immediately; Fine waived

charges.charge_description: POSSESSION OF A FIREARM AND AMMUNITION BY A CONVICTED FELON(3)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of 120 months, as to each Count, with terms to run concurrent; Supervised Release for 3 years, with terms to run concurrent; SMA $500.00 due immediately; Fine waived

charges.charge_description: POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE A CONTROLLED SUBSTANCE CONTAINING A MIXTURE OR SUBSTANCE OF METHAMPHETAMINE(4)

charges.charge_disposition: Custody of BOP for a term of 120 months, as to each Count, with terms to run concurrent; Supervised Release for 6 years, with terms to run concurrent; SMA $500.00 due immediately; Fine waived
